messages.subject: Dates in Da Bronx?
messages.content:
You got some class going on in Da Bronx?

-Jboxy

messages.subject: Dates in Da Bronx?
messages.content:
Hello Jboxy,

Thanks for reaching out! It looks like you're interested in classes in the Bronx. Currently, we don't have any classes scheduled directly in the Bronx, but we do offer externships there. Specifically, you can attend an externship at Rebekah Rehab Extended Care Center located at 1070 Havenmeyer Ave, Bronx, NY 10462. The externships are held from 7am â€“ 3pm.

If you're looking to attend classes, we have several options available in New York City. Here are the upcoming schedules:

messages.subject: cna
messages.content:
I need a refund. This isn't for me.

_Jilcky

messages.subject: cna
messages.content:
Hello Jilcky,

Thank you for reaching out. I understand that you wish to request a refund. To proceed, please complete the form available at this link: https://tiamedical.com/refund.

As per our policy, if you cancel within 7 days of signing the enrollment agreement but before instruction begins, you will receive a refund of all monies paid except for the non-refundable registration fee. After this period, the refund amount will be adjusted based on the tuition liability as of your last date of physical attendance and any textbooks or supplies accepted.

If you need any further assistance or have additional questions, please don't hesitate to ask. We're here to help!

Best regards,

CNA Allie
Let us know if you have any questions â€” we're here to help!
